name: n-queens-game-mobile
description: Complete N-Queens Strategy Game for Mobile and Web

scripts.dev: npm run dev:server & npm run dev:client
scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:mobile
scripts.build:mobile: cd client && npm run build && npx cap sync
scripts.test: npm run test:server && npm run test:client
scripts.deploy:heroku: git subtree push --prefix server heroku main
scripts.mobile:android: cd client && npm run build && npx cap sync android && npx cap open android
scripts.mobile:ios: cd client && npm run build && npx cap sync ios && npx cap open ios
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install

author: N-Queens Game Team
